Stamoulis Contact Info Athens University of Economics and Business, Department of Computer Science, 12 Kodrigtonos St, (3rd floor) Athens, Greece Tel.: +30 210-8203549 E-mail: gstamoul@aueb.gr Full CV: [last updated September 2010] Studies Ph.D., Dept. of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, Massachusetts Institute of Technology (1991) M.Sc., Dept. of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, Massachusetts Institute of Technology (1988) Diploma of Electrical Engineer, National Technical University of Athens (1987) Research Interests Economics of telecommunications networks: charging schemes and economic/incentives mechanisms for management of Internet traffic. Broadband access: technologies and applications, regulatory issues, demand analysis, design and cost analysis of access and transport networks. Auction mechanisms for allocation of spectrum, networking capacity and digital resources: design of mechanism, analysis of bidding strategies, design of intelligent agents to support user's bidding. Reputation-based incentives' mechanisms for electronic environments (peer-to-peer systems, e-marketplaces etc.) Telecoms regulation: Relevant markets' analysis, cost-based pricing, Universal Service.
